text: The food is decent. I mean, it's pizza hut. But I have had too many bad experiences here. Just this last time I found 4 hairs of varying length in my wings. I mean, I ate them. But that's nasty bro. You're lucky my standards are low.

name: Spiritualized Kaos
text: You can eat a buffet menu as much as you want at a very cheap price. The small size of the restaurant, the familiar treatment of the employees and the quality of the food will make you forget that you are in a fast food franchise. Also, the views are magnificent from the bridge over the Missouri River.

text: Just called to see what the specials were and after I said, "Thank you." The lady that answered the phone hung up on me without saying anything at all. Extremely unprofessional if you ask me!
